description: Helps Content Marketers quickly locate existing content assets, brand guidelines, style documentation, and reference materials across organizational content libraries.

friction_addressed.description: Finding existing content assets, brand guidelines, approved messaging, and reference materials scattered across systems
Answering repeated questions about brand guidelines, approved terminology, content status, and asset locations

estimated_time_savings.primary_benefit: Faster asset discovery and brand guidance retrieval

capabilities: Search content asset libraries by topic, format, date, or channel
Retrieve brand voice guidelines and style documentation
Find approved messaging, taglines, and positioning statements
Locate existing content for repurposing opportunities
Answer questions about brand standards and terminology
Find content templates and formatting guides
Retrieve content calendar and editorial planning documents

data_sources.name: Content Library
data_sources.description: Published blog posts, articles, ebooks, and downloadable assets

data_sources.name: Brand Guidelines
data_sources.description: Style guide, brand voice documentation, visual identity standards

data_sources.name: Content Templates
data_sources.description: Blog templates, brief templates, social media formats

data_sources.name: Editorial Calendar
data_sources.description: Content planning documents, publishing schedules, topic calendars

example_queries: Find all blog posts about customer success from this year
What's our approved messaging for the new product launch?
Show me the brand voice guidelines for social media
Do we have any existing content about SEO best practices?
What's the correct way to format case study titles?
Find content that's performed well on the topic of AI
Where's the template for content briefs?
What ebooks do we have that could be updated for 2024?
guardrails: Only searches organizational content libraries - does not create content
References official brand guidelines as authoritative source
Flags when content may be outdated (>12 months old)
Does not access restricted or confidential content unless user has permissions
Cannot modify or delete content - read-only access
Indicates when requested content type may not exist
success_metrics: Reduction in time spent searching for content assets
Reduced repeat questions to content team leads
